en.History1: Welcome to my high-tech soda factory.
en.History2: Anyway, my name is Dr. Pepperational Cola Drinkvide. I'm about to discover a fascinating soda unique in the world that will make everyone happy.
en.History3: But I have a problem, I don’t have an assistant that can help me create the definitive soda. wait!
en.History4: YOU! You must help me, your face tells me that you understand the division of rational numbers. is not that so?
en.History5: ah do not worry it's the simplest, I'll teach you.
en.Intro1: The integers can be divided, an integer is a complete unit, like a cake, a pencil, a soda.
en.Intro2: We are going to divide the soda into two
en.Intro3: The soda is equal to 2 parts of 2, 2/2 is equal to 1.
en.Intro4: If we take half, there will be ½.
en.Intro5: Now we divide that soda for 4 people, in total 4 servings means 4/4, if we take 3 servings, it will be only ¼.
en.Intro6: If you want to divide an integer to zero, it is not possible!
en.Tuto1: Now help me fill these sodas according to the division.
en.Tuto2: Click on the machine once to fill a fraction, until it is the correct fraction.
en.Tuto3: Now click on the next one.
en.Tuto5: Excellent! We finished the first order.
en.Signs1: Do you know The rule for Dividing signed numbers?
en.Signs2: Numbers have a positive sign (+) or negative (-), positive signs are not written.
en.Signs3: The / sign is also expressed as ÷.
en.Signs4: The sign of the quotient depends on the signs of the dividend and the divisor.
en.Signs5: You can consult it whenever you want in the information button!
en.Tutorial1: Help me find the ultimate drink!
en.Tutorial2: This is the new recipe (-8 / 4 =?), Fill the bottles with the right drink and help me discover its result!
en.Tutorial3: According to the recipe (-8 / 4 =?) The first soda must contain negative drink (-8), click on the magenta button until it is filled.
en.Tutorial5: The second bottle should be filled with a positive drink (+4), click on the yellow button.
en.Tutorial7: Now according to the laws of signs, the sign of the quotient must be.
en.Tutorial9: Fill the last bottle with negative drink.
en.Tutorial10: Congratulations! The result was a negative relaxing drink!
